column1: Ayo Dosunmu 26 pts 7 rebs vs Grizzlies 2021 Summer League
With pick #38 in the NBA draft, the Chicago Bulls select Ayo Dosunmu, ILL
[Shams] Chicago Bulls rookie Ayo Dosunmu, the 38th overall pick in July NBA draft, is signing a guaranteed two-year, $2.48M deal, sources tell @TheAthletic @Stadium.

Bulls Rookie Ayo Dosunmu buries the triple to give Chicago the lead in the 4th Quarter (106-105)
Ayo Dosunmu NAILS a clutch three to take the lead. He has 14 points on 6/6 shooting tonight.

I didn't know this: the Yoruba people (of Western Africa) have given the NBA some of their all time greats including Hakeem Olajuwon, Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, Giannis Antetokounmpo and a few solid players such as Victor Oladipo, Bam Adebayo and Ayo Dosunmu amongst others

(Plus/Minus Review) Steph Curry led all players last night in "plus/minus" - notching a +31 in 32 minutes for the Warriors in a win against Atlanta.
